reviewText: I love to watch any documentary on art. This one was okay. I did find some of the artists a bit over weird at times. I got the feeling they were more focused on the way they wanted people to perceive them as artist physically or emotionally rather than through their work. Still very entertaining and put together nicely. Have watched a few times since purchase.
lots of fun and a view of the art world that really informs those of us who cannot directly participate, but are directly influenced by it.
I recently bought this dvd and it was by chance, i was looking for some art videos from BBC and found it, Great stuff for those who want to know a little more of some contemporary artists.
